entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Restore and build (publish) fail on docker ARM64 #32781

Closed

  • "dotnet -h" throwing segfault #14473
  • PublishSingleFile alter deps.json or contents as part of PostBuildEvent before compressing the single .exe #14327
  • Should _CheckForInvalidTargetPlatformVersion look at the moniker instead of the version only? #14165
  • Windows Container nanoserver:1809 errors out with self-contained ASP.NET 5 app #13784

PullRequests

Created

  • Make GenerateToolsSettingsFileFromBuildProperty incremental #32798
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • Preview 6 branding #32796
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Containers: add support for using 'podman' without a system 'docker' alias. #32783
    untriaged

Merged

  • Enable EventSourceSupport in ASP.NET Native AOT apps #32538
    untriaged, Area-WebSDK
  • Containers: rename "Docker daemon" to "local registry". #32751
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Bump Verify.Xunit from 19.14.1 to 20.0.0 in /eng/dependabot #32767
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, dependencies

Updated

  • Make GeneratePublishDependencyFile incremental #32305
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • Reference ILLink analyzer matching ILLink version #32045
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #32730
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
